system:
note description: "EiffelVision accelerator. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_I export {../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xmlEV_INTERMEDIARY_ROUTINES} ../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_actions_internalactions_internal redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Connect interface. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Setup Current do create ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_keykey ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature -- Access
f_key../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_keykey: ../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY -- Representation of the character that must be entered -- by the user. See class EV_KEY_CODE
f_shift_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required: FalseBOOLEAN -- Must the shift key be pressed?
f_alt_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required: FalseBOOLEAN -- Must the alt key be pressed?
f_control_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required: FalseBOOLEAN -- Must the control key be pressed?
feature -- Element change
f_set_key../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_set_keyset_key (a_key: ../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY) -- Set a_key as new key that has to be pressed. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_keykey := a_key.Falsetwin end
f_enable_shift_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_enable_shift_requiredenable_shift_required -- "Shift" must be pressed for the key combination. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required := True end
f_disable_shift_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_disable_shift_requireddisable_shift_required -- "Shift" is not part of the key combination. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_shift_requiredshift_required := False end
f_enable_alt_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_enable_alt_requiredenable_alt_required -- "Alt" must be pressed for the key combination. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required := True end
f_disable_alt_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_disable_alt_requireddisable_alt_required -- "Alt" is not part of the key combination. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_alt_requiredalt_required := False end
f_enable_control_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_enable_control_requiredenable_control_required -- "Control" must be pressed for the key combination. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required := True end
f_disable_control_required../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_disable_control_requireddisable_control_required -- "Control" is not part of the key combination. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_control_requiredcontrol_required := False end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_accelerator.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR note option: stable attribute end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_destroy../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xml#f_destroydestroy -- Free resources of Current do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_destroyedset_is_destroyed (True) end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_IMP
